attributes.class: ms-bgColor-white ms-bgColor-gray20--hover ms-fontColor-themeDark--hover sp-css-borderColor-neutralLight sp-card-borderHighlight sp-card-subContainer
attributes.title: [$Title])

attributes.iconName: =if([$Title] == '-', 'fieldEmpty', if([$Title] == 'M365', 'OfficeLogo', if([$Title] == 'Power Apps', 'PowerApps', if([$Title] == 'Teams', 'TeamsLogo', if([$Title] == 'SharePoint', 'SharepointLogo', if([$Title] == 'PowerPoint', 'PowerPointLogo', if([$Title] == 'Word', 'WordLogo',if([$Title] == 'Excel', 'ExcelLogo',if([$Title] == 'OneNote', 'OneNoteLogo',if([$Title] == 'Power BI', 'PowerBILogo', if([$Title] == 'Lists', 'BacklogList', if([$Title] == 'MS Whiteboard', 'WhiteBoardApp16', if([$Title] == 'Publisher', 'PublisherLogo', if([$Title] == 'Stream', 'StreamLogo', if([$Title] == 'Outlook', 'OutlookLogo', if([$Title] == 'ToDo/Planner', 'ToDoLogoInverse', if([$Title] == 'PowerApps', 'PowerAppsLogo', if([$Title] == 'PowerAutomate', 'PowerAutomateLogo', if([$Title] == 'Forms', 'OfficeFormsLogo', if([$Title] == 'Access', 'AccessLogo', if([$Title] == 'OneDrive', 'OneDriveLogo', if([$Title] == 'Delve', 'DelveLogo', 'FieldEmpty')))))))))))))))))))))
